title: Tahm kench can't eat tristana
body: just went tahm kench support with a tristana and I couldn't eat her the entire game. had no trouble eating enemies or other allies along with creeps and minions from jungle, but no matter what I couldn't eat tristana.  I normally wouldn't post considering this is bound to be known but it was ranked and now im sad{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: I guess he isn't into... yordling. :^)
I hate you so much right now....... (gives an upvote anyway)
banned

Yes if yordles weren't a race :D

I suppose both COULD apply though. Point taken.
Well...we did want a tristana nerf...I guess this counts?
Finaly a tristana's nerf.

I'd say this isn't a problem with exclusively Trist, but everyone [at different times].

Tahm Kench has had a numerous amount of bugs for awhile now and I've seen nothing done about it. He's picked frequently enough, I'd like to finally see a lot of his bugs fixed.

So you all know what I'm talking about, here are some examples...

- Highlighting enemy with 3 stacks. Press W. Minion or ally nearby is eaten instead.
- Eat a minion, can't spit it out. Once the timer ends and TK's done flashing, minion drops right on top of him with no damage taken.
- After using R, use Q... it goes in the opposite direction it was pointed.
- W just not working sometimes on enemy champs... in range, 3 stacks, mashing W, nothin'.

There is also the bug of minions just randomly dying with no gold dropping while eaten by tahm, the one where an ally clicks you near the end of your ult, but instead of traveling, they just end up in your belly as if you had used devour on them, the bug where devoured ally's taking damage when the untargetability should have stopped that damage( although sometimes it's hard to tell if they just weren't inside your belly yet), the bug where you eat an ally, the game shows that they are still alive, you escape, spit them out, and then they die( not sure if they died before they were inside me and that devour just delayed their death or if they took damage that was delayed being calculated until after they were spit out)( and yes I'm sure that the death was through some delayed ability or damage over time, this bug has happened multiple times when there was no chance of that), and then the other almost unnoticeable bug where after you regurgitate an enemy champ, they don't get the .25 second stun. It can be really hard to tell since the stun is so short but it has messed up some of combos and I have even had it where I would spit an enemy onto ally cc like a jinx snare and the enemy was somehow able to flash away before they were snared even though I spit them on top of the trap.

> [{quoted}](name=Crash BandiWHOA,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Y5AkAkGy,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-01-31T11:53:29.376+0000)
>
> I'd say this isn't a problem with exclusively Trist, but everyone [at different times].
> 
> Tahm Kench has had a numerous amount of bugs for awhile now and I've seen nothing done about it. He's picked frequently enough, I'd like to finally see a lot of his bugs fixed.
> 
> So you all know what I'm talking about, here are some examples...
> 
> - Highlighting enemy with 3 stacks. Press W. Minion or ally nearby is eaten instead.
> - Eat a minion, can't spit it out. Once the timer ends and TK's done flashing, minion drops right on top of him with no damage taken.
> - After using R, use Q... it goes in the opposite direction it was pointed.
> - W just not working sometimes on enemy champs... in range, 3 stacks, mashing W, nothin'.

I main Tahm Kench and can attest to all of these with exception of the Q after R. It can be really frustrating when your W just decides it does not want to work... :/
maybe he doesn't like the taste of magical rats?
